name: 朴維鎮
objective: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
schedule:
Week 1	Modern Quality Management and Improvement
Week 2	The DMAIC Problem Solving Process
Week 3	Statistical Models or Quality Control and Improvement
Week 4	Statistical Inference in Quality Control and Improvement
Week 5	How SPC Works
Week 6	Variables Control Charts
Week 7	Attribute Control Charts
Week 8	Quiz, Independent Study
Week 9	Midterm Exam (In-Class, 1 Cheat Sheet, Calculator)
Week 10	Determining Process and Measurement System Capability
Week 11	Time-Weighted Control Charts
Week 12	Advanced Control Charting Techniques
Week 13	Multivariate SPC
Week 14	Process Adjustment and Process Monitoring
Week 15	Basic Experimental Design for Process Improvement
Week 16	Process Optimization, Basic Acceptance Sampling Procedures, Additional Sampling Procedures
Week 17	Quiz, Independent Study
Week 18	Final Exam (In-Class, 1 Cheat sheet, Calculator)
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm Exam: 30 points – Test of covered topics
2. Final Exam: 35 points – Test of covered topics
3. Quiz: 10 points
4. Homework: 20 points
5. Attendance: 5 points
materials: Statistical Quality Control (7th Ed., Wiley) by Douglas C. Montgomery
